article.title: U.S. Army Corp of Engineers Awards SAIC Energy Savings Performance Contract
article.author: Katie Packard
article.text: Science Applications International Corporation (SAIC) has been awarded an Energy Savings Performance Contract by the U.S. Army Corp of Engineers to design, construct and obtain financing for projects that will reduce energy and water consumption and costs as well as promote the use of renewable energy technologies. The contract has an estimated total value of $50 million if all options are exercised.
